resources.string: Use the map of Kaloor,Cochin and quickly locate essential amenities Educational Institutions, ATM ,Banks, Hospitals and Restaurants others with ease.
" SMEClabs is the research, development and training wing of SMEC Automation, an ISO 9001:2008 global solution provider and the Authorized System Integrator of Schneider Electric, France."

The Android based Building Automation system controls the appliances in the 3 floors of a building each floor consists of two lights one a chandelier and one fan. It consists of an Aurdino controller and relay boards for switching the lines in the three floors
using the android application installed in the phone we can control the appliances by selecting each floor in the menu. The menu consists of three pages for the consecutive floors
We can control the appliances within a range of 20 meters using this systemn
To see the welcome slider again click Play Again
